title: U.S. carbon pollution rose in 2025, a reversal from prior years
full_text: U.S. carbon pollution rose in 2025, a reversal from prior years. U.S. emissions rose last year, new research says: The country spewed 2.4% more heat-trapping gases from the burning of fossil fuels in 2025 than in the year before.. In a reversal from previous years pollution reductions, the United States spewed 2.4% more heat-trapping gases from the burning of fossil fuels in 2025 than in the year before, researchers calculated… [+4278 chars]
